data.title: TMS Streams Dededen Anniversary Anime With Seibu Railways
data.meta_description: Shorts by Kimi ni Todoke/My Little Monster animators mark studio's 50th year, railways' 100th year
data.text:
The studio TMS Entertainment (Detective Conan, Lupin III, Yowamushi Pedal) began streaming the first short in Dededen, its new original anime with Seibu Railways, on Monday. The anime celebrates both the 50th anniversary of TMS Entertainment and the 100th anniversary of Seibu Railways. TMS Entertainment happens to be located near the Araiyakushimae Station on the Seibu Shinjuku Line.

The anime follows the daily life of the main lead Amoru Tokorozawa and the railway. TMS plans to make five episodes, each 75 seconds long. It is running on the train's onboard SmileVision screens, as well as on the Smile StationVision screens around major stations from February 23 to December 31.
